property.name: server_port
property.description: Kibana is served by a back end server. This controls which port to use.

property.name: kibana_index
property.description: Kibana uses an index in Elasticsearch to store saved searches, visualizations and dashboards. It will create a new index if it doesn't already exist.

property.name: elasticsearch_ping_timeout
property.description: Time in milliseconds to wait for elasticsearch to respond to pings, defaults to request_timeout setting.

property.name: elasticsearch_request_timeout
property.description: Time in milliseconds to wait for responses from the back end or elasticsearch. This must be > 0.

property.name: elasticsearch_shard_timeout
property.description: Time in milliseconds for Elasticsearch to wait for responses from shards. Set to 0 to disable.

property.name: elasticsearch_startup_timeout
property.description: Time in milliseconds to wait for Elasticsearch at Kibana startup before retrying.
